subject: Re: [junit] Re: How to use JUnits for PL/SQL Stored Procedure
msgSnippet: ... This is what I meant. I hope the original requester finds it useful. -- J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger Diaspar Software Services http://www.diasparsoftware.com
messageBody:
